name: Castle Chaos (itch) (Gdev Studios)
description:
Castle Chaos is a very chill and nonchaotic game as judged from the title. Definitely not extremely chaotic with controls inverting epic boss fights and rock person. Join the hooded wizard through his treacherous journey throughout the deadly castle. Good Luck! PS. The WebGL version wasn't working at all so that is why there is only a download for now. Thank you for your patience.

Controls:

WD or Arrow Keys to move

Space to Jump

Left Click to shoot

This game was made for the brackey's game Jam in collaboration with TurkeyTheSqrl (who did the incredible art) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ92nsv8tq-JMswySl05zMA, and daBarry (who did the music) https://www.beatstars.com/dabarry/feed.
